title: [K-12] Project for Developing a Self-assessment Tool to Diagnose High School Students' Readiness for Independent Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: A collaborative project for designing and validating an online learning readiness diagnostic tool centered on mathematics subjects

learning_goals: Learners can develop a 36-item questionnaire defining the five core competencies required for independent online learning (time management, self-regulation, technology utilization, critical thinking, communication)
Learners can explain the process of validating the validity and reliability of developed tools using PLS path analysis
Learners can propose personalized learning strategies (three or more types) based on learner type classifications derived from diagnostic results
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
